title: Drivel-ology: Challenging LLMs with Interpreting Nonsense with Depth
summary: This paper introduces Drivelology, a linguistic phenomenon of "nonsense with depth" that requires contextual inference, moral reasoning, or emotional interpretation, and challenges LLMs to interpret such expressions.
